nodes.name: KYC

nodes.documentation: @return true if `account` has been KYC authorized.
nodes.name: kycAuthorized

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows a KYC verifier to grant KYC authorization to accounts.
@param accounts Array of addresses that have been KYC authorized.
nodes.name: grantKYCAuthorizations

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows a KYC verifier to revert previous KYC authorization to accounts.
@param accounts The addresses that have been KYC reverted.
nodes.name: revertKYCAuthorizations
KYC

nodes.documentation: @return true if `account` has been KYC authorized.
nodes.name: kycAuthorized

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows a KYC verifier to grant KYC authorization to accounts.
@param accounts Array of addresses that have been KYC authorized.
nodes.name: grantKYCAuthorizations

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows a KYC verifier to revert previous KYC authorization to accounts.
@param accounts The addresses that have been KYC reverted.
nodes.name: revertKYCAuthorizations

devdoc.details: Implements a list of accounts that have been reviewed and authorized after a KYC process.. Since it is less critical than owning the contract, the role of KYC can be accomplished by several addresses, which is implemented using a custom KYCVerifierRole.

grantKYCAuthorizations(address[]).details: Allows a KYC verifier to grant KYC authorization to accounts.

params.accounts: Array of addresses that have been KYC authorized.

kycAuthorized(address).return: true if `account` has been KYC authorized.

revertKYCAuthorizations(address[]).details: Allows a KYC verifier to revert previous KYC authorization to accounts.

params.accounts: The addresses that have been KYC reverted.

devdoc.title: KYC
